Replies.Reply: For three hundred years the great plagues have swept the earth. Diseases created from the experiments of the Alchemists.
...but there was also a miracle. One of these plagues helped nature create a new kind of being.
About time.
On three gents. One, two...
Don't you dare.
Jones!
It is my pleasure to inform you that you are under arrest for trafficking influenza vaccine.
health act, whereby you have withheld borough sponsored vaccines from your tenants.
Anything you say will be held against you as evidence and, by endangering the public good, you are not entitled to a lawyer.
There's only one other thing.
Smells terrible.
I'll get out here.
No.
Arrest her.
Find any witnesses and shut them up.
Can I step in?
Hello Dominic.
Any identification?
Tanya Garfield.
Alright, we'll close this down gents. None of you are to say a word, not even to your old mother.
Jones. Make sure.
He saw what happened?
What's your name?
Stop that.
What's your name then?
You live around here?
I grew up 3 streets from here.
Or should I say, I crawled out of here.
No one else will do anything about this, you know? They just think this is a slum. No one really cares what happens to the people here. Except for you. And me.
What did you see?
What kind of man?
You're sure it was a Brother?
Where did he go?
Alright, you go with these men, they'll look after you. I promise.
Get him to describe it all. And keep him away from everyone.
And get him some food.
I've quarantined the neighborhood.
As far as anyone knows we have a new influenza outbreak.
They're cooperating, closing all phone lines in and out except directly to us.
It's better than the alternative, sir.
That's nice for them.
Not particularly.
How do you know I don't?
Senior Brother Edgar... How long have you known about this?
Yes. Withholding evidence.
Wouldn't want anyone criticizing the church I suppose.
Really.
None?
Differently.
Alright then. So what do you suggest?
Ok, ok, quiet down.
Gentlemen, there's no other way to put it. We have only 2 days to find the suspect.
Quiet!
What you are about to hear will not leave this room. Everyone understand? Jones?
I would suggest anyone with a weak stomach leave now.
This is Brother Silus.
Jones, sit down.
Quiet!
There will be two teams. Frank, I want you and Abernathy up in the buildings around Bridge Square.
I'll lead the other team with Dominic, Jones and Queen's Imperial Guard in support. No guns, batons only.
You heard me. He's to be taken alive.
Anything?
It's getting late.
Ok. We'll sit tight.
Frank?
Anything?
Check each floor again.
Frank.
Let's go.
Police. Get back inside. Get back.
Antibiotics. They say it's like an animal bite.
I want to thank you.
I don't mean that. The blood, they say it saved my life. Is it true that people who go to church are given your blood?
So smooth.
Healed already.
I don't have one. Not any more.
Influenza. My husband was quick.
Do we seem pathetic to you?
Yes. We're good at that.
Take them away from here.
You nearly gave me a heart attack.
Quiet.
Police. Put your hands where I can see them!
Let him go.
He's harmless. Let him go.
Brother Silus. What's going on?
And now he's got Steph. Why does he want her?
Steph was staying with me. She was wearing my coat. It was me he was after. Wasn't it?
It has to be me. That's what he wants. It's the only chance Steph's got.
Jones! And we can't make it too hard. He has to be able to get in.
That's the way it will be. I'm the bait.
What is it? Jones?
Cover me.
Get him down.
If he escapes then Steph is dead.
Don't move!
I said don't move. Where is she, where's the girl?
He's nothing like you.
No.
Why don't you just kill me?
Kill me!
You're insane.
You don't have to do this. You can change things.
No.
Hello! I'm down here. Silus...
Silus...
What is it?
Is there something wrong?
I don't understand.
For me, everything has changed now.
Now I see hope, and I see a child, the first female of her kind.
Perhaps Edgar got what he wanted after all, because it time this child will truly change our world.
See here. This is what you need to look for.
A genetic mutation, we all carry it. But we now know a virus activates it.
This Virus plays some unknown role in the birth the Brothers. Of course the mutation occurs very rarely these days. And only in males.
Strange isn't?
That God would choose such humble vehicle for a miracle. The mothers invariably come from the slums, we don't know why.
This is your 7th isn't it?
Yes, her first was successful, a Brother was born. Thereafter variously malformed offspring. We can only hope this one will be different.
You'll have to try harder this time.
What is it?
Don't be stupid woman!
This is your brother Silus. You will teach him.
No, not any more.
Welcome to the world little Brother.
The girl?
This is good.
Yes. But her death served a greater good. Every trap needs bait.
Are you sure you won't join me?
For now the Brothers feel we should deal with this ourselves.
Which is why you must find him.

For centuries we Brothers have served mankind and them us. The great union. But remember your history. 300 years ago when our kind were first born into this world they burnt our children as monsters. They had no notion of evolution. In another world we might all have been slaughtered, only to be remembered in myth, monsters to frighten the young or a puzzle for anthropologists. We must refuse to let one aberrant individual destroy the balance between the two races. The old prejudices are still there. Human beings are paranoid creatures by nature.
Silus. Simply concern yourself with finding Edgar. Find your Brother so that we can help him.
300 years ago, with these simple instruments, the alchemist Guiseppi De Angelo discovered what we today call genetic science.
He deciphered that the Brothers were a new race of beings, sent by god, to serve and protect you.
De Angelo formed the church of the Brotherhood. He was a great great man, but there were others, bad men, who took what De Angelo had discovered and experimented without concern for the results.
Yes.
Yes. That's right.
All the bad things.
Silus. You know Professor Liepsky.
He decapitated a guard as they brought him in. Even though he was sedated. He said he will drink us all dry.
Go on, Brother Silus will soon be part of the inner circle of the Brotherhood. He should know this.
This is what Edgar was doing Silus. Trying to genetically control the birth of Brothers.
The blood flows, through them, to us and we preserve them, preserve the blood we are bound to protect.
Now he carries this thing out into the world. Can you imagine what will happen if he infects others?
The infection is spreading. Each day he shares his blood with more of them. Even though they are locked in their homes.
Clear. So very clear your eyes.
The Queen has instructed the government to evacuate the city around the quarantine zone. In another day they will take action.
Eradication. Of everything within the area. They will burn it all.
It is a necessary step. We cannot let this escape.
Is it the policewoman? Is this affecting your thinking? There is no love for our kind Silus. Only service.
There is no debate. They will be sacrificed, so the rest will be pure.
This policeman, Jones. He talked to the press. Told them this came from Edgar.
There are members of the inner circle who question the way you have handled this. Blame you for this man's actions. I have made it clear that you will fix this. That you will silence him.
These are hard things we do. But you must think of the greater good. And of your own future.
Is that my mother?
It is taken care of.
Augustus. We failed this girl. We asked her to help us catch him, and then we failed her.
Perhaps this is beyond us. Perhaps we should inform the authorities.
If they find out we are covering up these deaths...
Perhaps they have good reason.
A matter of weeks.
Is there something wrong?
You're right to not like it. It is political.
We thought we could find Brother Edgar ourselves. We were wrong.
The greatest danger is if this were to become public knowledge.
It's more than that Captain. This is about prejudice, or rather the nature of it. As a female surely you would understand.
How many other Captains in this borough are female?
How are your actions judged, the same or differently from the men.

Exactly. If a white man kills, then he is just a killer. If a black man kills, then all black men are suspect. That is the nature of prejudice. Those who are different are grouped together. If only one Brother does a bad thing then all Brothers are suspect, because we are different. And then what would this world be like, if there was no hope?
First, there is something you should hear.
Thank you Captain. Could we have the plate?
Senior Brother Edgar. Until 3 weeks ago, he was a trusted and talented theologian and scientist.
He was personally responsible for developing the most recent influenza antivirals. It is because of him that most of you are alive today. His behavior appeared normal. Next.
The victims. John Anderson. Julie Danes. Tanya Garfield. All in their early 20's, but beyond that no obvious connection. Next.

There is no precedent for Brother Edgar's behavior. No Brother has ever taken a human life, not in the 300 years since we began. Not one. Our role has been to preserve and maintain the human life. Not take it.
don't understand it. And therefore it's difficult to predict. The only thing we know is where he will strike next.
We share the same mother. There is a bond.
Yes.
No.
He will come.
Do you want me to save her?
She is dying.
Lilly. Stop fighting now. Fall back, fall back...
Quiet.
He's going up.
No.
We all caught Edgar.
Sometimes the rituals call for it.
In some ways my body is like a human embryo. The cells regenerate quickly. It is why we live so long. Will someone come for you?
I see.
I am sorry.
No. Fragile. Worn down by nature.
I think yours will be a good life to watch, Lilly. Goodbye.
How is he?
Is the brace necessary?
Insane then.
With what?
Designed?
Since when do they sanction such things?
The police officer. Lilly. Did he infect her with this?
Hello my Brother.
You are sick. We will help you if we can.
She survived.
You won't touch her.
I will pray for your cure, Brother.
Yes.
The church does not deny the potential. Only the motivations of those who want to exploit it. And the fact that we understand so little of its power.
Disease is part of nature, it will always be a part of our lives.
Let the blood be one and the two races join, as the Perfect Creature.
The question becomes what will he do next? He said he would kill us all. But especially the police officer. Lilly.
No. You are divine. It is the world that offends me.
It is Edgar.
She is not what he was after.
Yes. He will come for you Lilly.
He will know. He will see and hear it.
Stay here.
It comes from Edgar. He has shared his blood with them.
No. He will keep her alive.
So that I will come for him.
He is somewhere in the quarantine zone. I will find him.
No search?
What kind of action?
And the innocents there, who are not infected?
No!
We have done this. Released this thing into the world. We have betrayed their trust in us, more than once. I won't do it again.
I want to help you. They know you talked to the press.
Why?
Do you have a map?
The water supply. Where is it?
He is there, with Lilly.
I will get in. You must go to the press. Tell them about the water.
Watch for me, Officer Jones.
We have. To our shame.
She must be protected.
I would ask for your help Brother.
Lilly?
In there.
No.
There is something very precious.
You will.
Hurry.
Everyone's ready Lilly.
Don't you move!
God help us. What an appalling sight.
That's a lie! We know you've been trading influenza vaccine in the workhouses!
You're a fucking liar!
This is a civil health violation!
Lil', you want some?
I'm not letting that scum put me off my food. That'd be like a moral victory.
Yeah. Lilly's kid. It died of the influenza, didn't it.
No. She never says anything.
Someone should flatten this cesspool and start again.
Where do you get a cup of tea around here?
There's a kid who saw it, down there.
Says it was a Brother. And they've got another fellow, that's all who saw it.
Now they'll all want feeding.
Lil'. He's here.
I think I hear choir music.
Hey. My old mum goes to church four times a week and gives blood.
There's no chance. Not a hope in hell.
Next he'll be wanting an fucking medal.
Fuck!
Why are we listening to this?!
What?
This is a dud.
Lil'.
Fuck!
Lilly!
Oh shit shit.
She's dying! She's fucking dying!
Get away from her!
Get away or I'll stick you!
Get out of my way.
He killed Lilly.
Bang.
Nicely done. You're more human than I thought.
You don't feel like a drink?
Now my girls, anyone hungry?
I knocked.
What's this then?
A saint.
A shopkeeper heard yelling. Went to see, found this. One witness.
She identified this lovely citizen. We thought maybe he had a grudge or was crazy. I guess we were wrong.
Right, then we put you somewhere safe and set up this place.
What are you talking about, she's probably dead already...
What are you doing?
Get back here, Lilly!
Lilly, wait! Damn you. Lilly!
You happy now?
Stephanie Richards, you just brought her in.
Will she recover?
What is this? What is it?
You're telling me that he's out there spreading this around?
He'll give it to Lilly!
That's it, Lilly's dead.
Great.
Come on then...
What do you want?
They can fuck off. For that matter, so can you.
You'd be the last person I'd trust.
I saw you. Remember. Watching Lilly, when she was asleep.
Maybe you're just like your Brother. Maybe you're helping him.
Do you know where she is?
You've changed. Not the outside.
Coffee's ready.
There's the quarantine zone. It's a pit. Slums.
There, all the old suburbs are supplied by their own artesian wells. Mineral springs. That's why it hasn't broken out of Jamestown, it's the water. Jamestown's water.
You'll never get in, they've circled the whole borough.
You're dead after this. You know that? Whatever happens.
I don't know nothing about it. I give 'em out. Make sure everyone gets 'em.
No, no, I swear it, I gave 'em their boosters, both of 'em. I'm a responsible landlord, I swear to god. There must've been something wrong with them vaccines.
I don't know what you're on about.
I want my lawyer.
I want a lawyer!
Fuck you then.
Lil'. I think you should see this.
I'd use the mask if I were you.
Come one!
You sure?
What's up with her?
Jones? Is she alright?
She's never said anything about a kid.
He's right. We don't even know where to begin.
He sent this to you. Specifically.
Yeah Lil'.
Not a thing.
You heard her. Once more for the empire.
Lil'! Lil'!
He's on the sixth floor! He's on the sixth floor!
Oi! How about me? He promised me some of that. I earned it.
Come on governor, you going to pay me or not?
He's crazy! Fucking crazy!
Hey?! Hey!
Don't, I didn't do nothing. It was a Brother. It was a Brother did it.
Albert.
You did?
A man.
A Brother.
He had teeth and everything.
He went straight up there.
All the bad things. Like bad germs and flu.
Marm? The Tribune. Do you have any comments on the death?
They're saying it was a Brother, is that true?
With the traffic. What's it matter.
Lil'.
Have you seen it?
It's a bite. If you know what I mean?
What'd he do?
How do you know?
Lilly's hurt. She's hurt!
He's in the ventilation shaft!
He's getting away!!
Jones! Back off.
This is spreading.
Brother Silus?
Why?
It says, "Everything flows from me. My blood will change the world." What does that mean?
Now he wont talk. Didn't see anything.
What about the telephonic companies?
Sit, sit.
You've done well Lilly. The reporter is more of a problem. We have 2 days by law before we have to release her. Then it's out.
I hate these things. I'm like a pin cushion.
I need you to stay with this, Lilly. You know Jamestown better than anyone, how to handle the people.
The Brothers have requested to be involved with the investigation.
You have a problem with it?
Good. I think they can help. And I don't want someone working on this whose got something against the Church.
Lilly, you're the least prejudiced person I know. In fact, you're the only one I know. That's important.
Do you know who he is? That's Brother Silus. They say one day he will lead the Brotherhood. He's a great man.
Do you respect anything?
My apartment was condemned, keep your hair on, what's left of it.
Isn't he amazing?
Police! Put the gun down now!
Put the gun on the ground and step away!
Wait!
Down! Right now, down on the ground!
Shut up!
Put your hands behind your back.
Help me. Please, I'm sick. Help me.
Quiet.
I said shut up!
Good. Now you're quiet.
Did you hear that Silus? I hope so.
The next one will be tomorrow.
Shoo.
You're so strong.
Do you like what they've done for me Silus?
Help me? I am being what I was meant to be. How can you help me from that? Or do you want to tame me? Brainwash me? Animal or vegetable, are those the two choices, Silus?
I want to share the feeling with you. To feel their blood flow until every last drop is yours, until that weak, pointless little pump finally stops.
The one I had, the police woman.
Is she dead?
Good. I will have her again.
You've chosen to watch over her.
I wont be able to forgive you for this you know? Not ever. In fact, when I get out of here...
I will make you see. I will show you the way. I will see you drink your little police woman right through.
How true.
Today my brother enters the history books, Professor.
Tonight all the Brothers will be with him. A perfect day for me to celebrate.
You won't be taking any more calls today.
Nice to meet you again.
You brought me the wrong one.
What do you see Freddy. Visions?
Don't be a greedy little pig Freddy. You have to earn more.
We have more to do.
You saved me...
When will you admit it. You're just like me.
Maybe you need some encouragement.
The little policewoman.
Oh, I've killed her already.
Has he tasted you yet, little policewoman?
He's just the same as me, you know it, you can feel it too.
We will see. You will be my tool.
I want you to take her and put her where they'll find her.
What have I said to you?
I hate arguments.
It almost sounds like children playing, don't you think?
I looked at your body. You have borne a child.
Did you abandon it? Your kind are good at that.
I can see why he likes you. But I have a better use for you. To save you, Silus will take my blood.
The world is insane. I am better than you. But they force me to serve you. Does that happen in a sane world? Forced to watch you waste the most precious thing you have. Life.
Do you know what they do to us when we are born? They take us from our mothers. Force us into a life of loneliness, and denial.
You have reminded me of something.
I must search out my mother, if she still lives. And kill her for what she did.
Do you like the world I am making for us, Silus? I haven't had your little policewoman yet. But I will soon. You'll just have to find me.
You know where I am. Everything flows from me...
He's coming little one. He's coming for you.
It is a maze down here. But given time, that thing will find her. Do things to her. I'll show you where she is, if you take some.
You're almost there anyway.
If I burn the skin from your face, I wonder how that would be. If you looked like a monster...
See for yourself.
Not quite.
He's become infected.
If she wasn't restrained she would try to kill you. Don't worry, it's only transmissible through their blood. We designed it that way.
Genetically designed. Edgar was experimenting with the virus that created you. It was sanctioned by the government.

Since not one Brother has been born in 70 years. And never a female of your kind from which we could breed. And we need to breed more Brothers. You give the world hope. To the people you're like gods walking the earth.
And Edgar was successful. Each of these women carried a Brother, for a time. But, the virus... changed.
And Edgar may be the first Brother to ever die.
Before that, his brain will wither like these women. Containment will be the issue.
No. She was lucky. But it is in Edgar's blood. It always will be.
Move back!
I don't like it when he does that.
You stop that or we'll use the gas!
If you don't stop that we'll use the gas. You hear me?
I turned off the lights to try and calm him...
We gassed him as usual. We waited 10 minutes. He must have held his breath.

...the ascension through the ranks of the Church has been fast for Brother Silus. He will now be the highest ranking cardinal outside the ruling council of the Brotherhood. This is largely seen as a reward for his handling of the last influenza pandemic.
You have been an opponent of those who want an easing in the ban on genetic research.
They would say you're denying legitimate research into a science that would change the world.
With the elimination of influenza, are we approaching a new era where disease might be a thing of the past?
Brother Silus' confirmation ceremony will be held today in the sacred Chapel of St. Augustine where all the Brotherhood will gather.
Professor Liepsky, looking more aged, worn, enters the control room. Alarms are sounding. At the console is a human male who looks terrified.
Soon enough my cherub. I've not finished with you yet.
You've been ripping me off! I should blow your dirty little brains out!
It's ok. I'm complying officer, see.
I'm doing it.
I'm getting wet now.
Sure. Anything you say.
What's wrong?
Does it matter, one's as good as the next?
You promised me some of that.
Hey!
Don't fucking touch me.
Hey!
Where've you gone now?
You scared the shit out of me.
But I'm sick. She's given me something...
Holy brother, please...
Forgive me. I've offended you...
Thank god you're here.
No. Containment is the issue now.
Some say this plague is the result of genetic experimentation, by the Brothers. Do you have a comment?
There are reports of residents being shot trying to escape the quarantine zone. Is that true?
We're asking everyone to stay in their homes in the sections of Jamestown now under quarantine.
We've blocked off this section, and here, containing the Jamestown slums.
Who has done this, Brother?
I have something to show you.
It is a miracle my Brother. She is a female, the first of our kind.
The first female of her kind. The first daughter given to us.
Come. Before they find her.
We must go.
